@shock9191, and anyone else having the issue with the game not launching:

I had the exact same issue.  You just need to install Steam - don't need to register or sign up for anything, just install it and the game will launch just fine.

Guys. THIS. WORKS.

I don't know what you are doing wrong, all you do is mount, install, and copy over the binaries folder to your install directory. THATS it.

I didn't even have to TOUCH B2launcher.exe.... the game is already in english. Also, it says to disable the game through your firewall, I didn't do that, I just turn my wifi off on my laptop when I want to play. Either way, EVERYTHING works FINE!

Thx SKIDROW, a day one release, top notch. This does work and is the premiere edition. Although I already had cracked steam working and Im running win 7 x64. But for those of you who cant get it to work. Just mount, install, copy crack from iso to directory in which you installed (binaries) (make sure you to add them and copy over the original when applicable, and be sure not to delete all the other files in the binaries that you are not making changes to. There should be 70 files and 14 folders in the binaries folder), copy both the b2launcher and the normal borderlands 2 app shortcut, and put them on the desktop. Use the b2launcher to adjust settings but not to actually launch the game. Use the other icon to do so. Make sure you installed steam, blocked borderlands 2 from the internet thru firewall (keeps the FBI away from your front door). Mark the borderlands 2 in your antivirus as trusted (as to ensure it doesn't delete files that you just added( this is because cracks can work it the same way a virus does, and tricks antivirus programs into thinking its a virus)). And pls make sure you install all the extras at the end of the bl2 install, be careful because for once there actually all unchecked (ie. directx, windows redistributed c++ 2005, etc., if you dont have these you will get errors.) Game should work, if not, reinstall and try again. As I said Im running win 7 x64 which from what I understand has the least problems. Thx SKIDROW, and Test_Verify for the upload. Thx gearbox for the awesome game, wish I had the money to actually buy it and support you guys, you deserve it for this masterpiece of a game. And last but not least....                    LONG LIVE TPB!!!!!!!!!!
